function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of critical appraisal of included papers","Impact":"Potential inclusion of low-quality or unreliable information","Mitigation":"Implement a process for critical appraisal to ensure high quality and reliable information","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Reviewers, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, reviewers"},{"Description":"Relying on a broad overview rather than critical appraisal","Impact":"Risk of including biased or incomplete information in the review","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough critical appraisal to ensure the completeness and accuracy of the information","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Reviewers, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, reviewers"},{"Description":"Use of wearable technology for early COVID-19 detection","Impact":"Potential false-positive or false-negative results leading to misinterpretation of infection status","Mitigation":"Regular validation and calibration of the wearable technology, and complementing with traditional testing methods","Technologies":"Wearable technology, validation and calibration tools","People":"General worldwide population affected by COVID-19","Owner":"Health authorities, technology developers"}]}
